description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Glaciers of the Alps. Being a narrative of excursions and ascents. An account of the origin and phenomena of Glaciers, and an exposition of the physical principles to which they are related ... With illustrations. (Appendix. Comparative view of the cleavage of Crystals and Slate-rocks; a lecture delivered ... the 6th of June, 1856.)" Author: TYNDALL, John - F.R.S Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10196.d.1." Page: 10 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1860 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003699111 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
